author: Prime Video
description:
Nick got real close. Starring Nicole Wallace and Gabriel Guevara, Culpa Mía is streaming on Prime Video.

About Culpa Mía:
Noah must leave her town, boyfriend and friends to move into her mom's new husband's mansion. There, she meets her new stepbrother Nick and their personalities clash from the very beginning. But the attraction they feel will lead them to live a forbidden relationship, where their rebellious and tormented tempers will turn their worlds upside down, making them fall madly in love.
 
About Prime Video:

title: Up close and personal with Nick | Culpa Mía

author: Prime Video
description:
Life’s too short not to spend it with the person you love. The final season of The Summer I Turned Pretty is now streaming on Prime Video.

About The Summer I Turned Pretty:
Belly Conklin is about to turn 16, and she’s headed to her favorite place in the world, Cousins Beach, to spend the summer with her family and the Fishers. Belly’s grown up a lot over the past year, and she has a feeling that this summer is going to be different than all the summers before. The Summer I Turned Pretty is based on the book by Jenny Han, who is creator and executive producer.

author: Prime Video
description:
Before class returns, the Maxton Hall cast reunites. Maxton Hall: Reunion brings together the group of friends of the first hit season based on the bestselling book by Mona Kasten. They reminisce about the filming of the series at iconic Marienburg castle and look forward to the Season 2 premiere.

Prime Video will return to Maxton Hall on November 7, based on the bestselling novel by Mona Kasten.

» Watch Maxton Hall on Prime Video: https://amzn.to/4a1Pcs9
» SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/PrimeVideoSubscribe
 
About Maxton Hall: When Ruby (Harriet Herbig-Matten) unwittingly witnesses an explosive secret at Maxton Hall private school, the arrogant millionaire heir James Beaufort (Damian Hardung) has to deal with the quick-witted scholarship student for better or worse: He is determined to silence Ruby. Their passionate exchange of words unexpectedly ignites a spark...
